name: Venocyber voice message
description: An application for sending and receiving voice messages

API_KEY.description: The API key for the voice message API

API_SECRET.description: The API secret for the voice message API

DATABASE_URL.description: The URL for the application's database

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The access key ID for the AWS S3 bucket

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The secret access key for the AWS S3 bucket

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: The name of the AWS S3 bucket for storing voice messages
